Text.Page: You'll want bandages if you're heading out. I've got scrolls and crystals as well, all at federation-mandated prices. I wonder if I should just point at items and nod, instead of pretending to haggle.
If you need crystals, go see Viator. Mahadam sells armor, and Ailesa has fine weapons. Merchants will buy your unneeded items too, or you can drop them off with a banker.
